entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who can see past Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is sitting in front of Harry and has a conversation with him.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is mentioned as a person who is looking down upon Karkaroff with intense dislike.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is mentioned as a person who has done a deal with Crouch and is being held by Moody.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned as a person who has made a deal with Karkaroff and is letting him go if he has enough new names.

relationships.description: Moody looks down upon Karkaroff with intense dislike.
Crouch has made a deal with Karkaroff and is letting him go if he has enough new names.
